dcterms:creator: Srk
dcterms:description: A dataset containing daily temperatures of 167 international cities and 157 U.S. cities from January 1, 1995 to May 2020, with columns for region, country, state, city, month, day, year, and average temperature.
dcterms:title: Average Daily Temperature Archive

dcterms:creator: Ashfaq Ali Shafin
dcterms:description: A dataset used to forecast average weather temperature of Bangladesh, containing monthly average temperature data along with rain data collected from 1901 to 2015.
dcterms:title: Monthly Average temperature of Bangladesh

dcterms:creator: Wang Ding-cheng
et al.
dcterms:description: A dataset containing monthly average temperature data from 1951 to 2003, used for air temperature prediction based on EMD and LS-SVM.
dcterms:title: Monthly average temperature during 1951-2003

dcterms:creator: Tim Appelhans
et al.
dcterms:description: A dataset providing climate information for the Kilimanjaro region, used to evaluate machine learning approaches for the interpolation of monthly air temperature.
dcterms:title: Climate information for Kilimanjaro region
